name: Mother Simulator 2
description:
============Tutorial============

Cleaning Disk:

Clean the dirty disks with the yellow wiper (by dragging it around the disk).

Wash the disks by dipping them into the water.

Then put the disk into the cupboard (the brown box).

Vacuuming:

Collect all the trashes.

Throw them into the grey bin.

Cooking:

Wait until it's cooked.

Put it into the disk before it gets burnt.

Drive your Brother to school:

Click! (Or space)

Market (Bargain):

Click or space when the marker pointed the green area.

Supermarket:

Choose the minimum prices of the 3 identical goods.
